comments:
Eclipse F1
Windows 2000.

Two perspectives showing simultaneously - Debug and Java.

I can't reproduce this yet.  I had the preference set to show the debug 
perspective when running.  I launched eclipse from within eclipse.  I did some 
stuff in the target eclipse.  I browsed some java classes in the java 
perspective in the development eclipse.  Then I closed the target eclipse.

See the attachment for appearance.

The following was in my development log.  Not sure if it is related (time stamp 
seems a bit old):

Will we have to protect setBounds with an ISafeRunnable as well? I wonder how 
many other SWT methods may end up making calls to other plugins.
Should protect as many places as we can.
There are currently no plans to work on this
